div.p: Today is Jersey Day! Show us your teams!! #rowvastrong

If you witness abuse happening, report this to
1-800-25ABUSE. #rowvastrong #NCAPM2020
#ChildAbusePreventionMonth
Don't forget this week is Spirit Week! We'd love to see your jammie spirit while remote learning this morning! #rowvastrong
In light of the Governor's response, Superintendent Sornberger will put out a video with response to anticipated questions shortly. #rowvastrong
Seniors- Please be sure to complete your Signing Day form and the Senior Survey form today. Please check your school email.
